result.longName: Al Argan International Real Estate Company - K.S.C.P.

assetProfile.address2: Free Trade Zone Shuwaikh (Block F25 - F41)
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Al Argan International Real Estate Company - K.S.C.P. operates as a real estate development company in Kuwait and internationally. It operates through Real Estate Investment, Contracting, and Hotels and Resorts segments. The company engages in owning, buying, managing, and selling of real estates and lands; conducting real estate studies and consulting activities; performing maintenance work related to buildings and real estates, including maintenance work, execution of civil, mechanical, electrical, elevators work, and air conditioning; and organizing real estate exhibitions. It also establishes real estate auctions; owns and manages commercial shops and housing complexes; trades in construction materials and equipment; constructs civil, mechanical, electrical, sanitary, elevators, air conditioning, aluminum, and carpentry contracting projects; and imports construction equipment. In addition, the company invests, owns, operates, manages, and leases hotels, clubs, motels, hospitality houses, rest houses, parks, gardens, exhibitions, restaurants, cafeterias, touristic and health resorts, entertainment, and sports projects. Further, it establishes and manages investment funds; undertakes infrastructure projects for housing, commercial, and industrial projects; engages in agricultural activities; offers medical services; and educational and entertainment activities. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Khaled Khudair Mashaan Khudair Al Mashaan
